name: HSH
description:
This is not your beautiful house.
Stuck in a strange house, survive the horrors lurking outside (and eventually inside) in this survival-oriented roguelike made for 7DRL in, well, 7 days.

I packed as many features as I could, including:

  • Kicking furnitures around
Example of a log kick message 10/10 best image ever
  • Procedurally generated world (each run is different)
Generated using BSP. There also is a forest outside, but its dangerous.
  • Easy to understand UI (for a retro roguelike)
  • Base building
Player getting mobbed outside of their base, base that is guarded by traps.
  • Follows the berlin interpretation,  except the fact that this game doesn't take place in a dungeon.

Feature missing:

  • Guns
  • Animals
  • Windows and mac ports (need an accessible machine to do so).

The font used is Potash 10x10, taken from dwarffortresswiki.org (graphic tileset repository). I used libtcod , cx_Freeze.
